template_type.description: From which pool do we select characters?.

use_persistent_seed.description: [bool]If set, this character uses a predictable seed based on peer id. This is most useful for ship characters.

armor_set.description: [string]What armor_set to use on the NPC. Empty won't do anything.

helmet_set.description: [string]What helmet_set to use on the NPC. Empty won't do anything.

cape_set.description: [string]What cape_set to use on the NPC. Empty won't do anything.
